title: Pesto and Mozzarella Grilled Sandwich
ingredients: ['6 slices crusty batch bread, toasted', '3 tablespoons pesto', '1 small aubergine, sliced', '1 small red pepper, sliced', '1 small red onion, sliced', '2 tomatoes, sliced', '100g fresh mushrooms, sliced', '6 slices mozzarella cheese', '4 cloves garlic', '1 pinch dried oregano', '1 pinch dried basil', '1 pinch salt and pepper to taste']
